formattedAddress: 808 West End Ave #911, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 808 West End Ave #911, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text: Vera at La V Image was a DREAM to work with for our wedding! We cannot recommend her enough. Vera photographed the whole bridal experience for us: Engagement photos, Bridal Shower Photos, and of course the wedding! We went with her because we loved the beautiful style of her photos. I especially loved her creative photos using the bridal veil, some photos being very soft, while others striking and capturing just the right candid moments. She also did beautiful portrait photos of our entire family. Our wedding photos were delivered at lightening speed.  I cannot say enough about our engagement photos which were taken on a local beach but my relatives thought were on an island paradise because of how Vera captured them. Your photographer is with you all day. Vera put my very shy husband at ease and I felt like she was a close friend through all of it. Highly highly recommend!! A+++++ You will NOT regret this decision.

originalText.text: La V Image team was awesome, Vera is a darling and her team is a great extension of her. They were seamless but very thoughtful in capturing the mood and celebration of our beautiful wedding day. I was stressed and jittery as many brides are, and through the photos and video I was able to appreciate the full beauty and elegance of our wedding. The photos are a treasure we will cherish forever.

originalText.text:
Absolutely enchanting and profoundly moving experience!

We embarked on this exhilarating adventure talking to Vera who introduced us to Ivan and Natalie.

Natalie & Ivan's ability to capture not just images, but emotions, was nothing short of magical. Each photograph is a symphony of joy, love, and unbridled happiness! Every stolen glance, every tear of joy, and every hearty laugh was encapsulated in their work.

They blended seamlessly into the background, yet their energy was infectious, putting us and our guests at ease. Their ability to capture candid moments was an absolute gift.

Their dedication to going above and beyond was evident in every step of the process, from the initial consultation to the final delivery of the photographs. Thank you, Vera, Natalie & Ivan.

La V image is an absolute gem, and their work is an eternal embrace of joy and love.

La V image is an absolute gem, and their work is an eternal embrace of joy and love.

originalText.text:
Oh my stars, where do I even begin to describe the sheer magic that Natalie & Ivan from la V Image brought to our special day? It was as if they could read our hearts and souls, capturing every unspoken emotion and turning it into photographs.

Every image is a masterpiece!

Their warmth and passion radiate from behind the camera, making us feel at ease and allowing our authentic selves to shine through. They effortlessly captured every stolen glance, every shared laugh, every tear of happiness – all the things that words could never fully convey.

But it's not just about the pictures; it's about the journey they took us on. From the early planning stages with Vera to the final reveal, their dedication and genuine care for our vision were amazing. They took the time to understand our story, our personalities, and our dreams.

To say that we are grateful is an understatement. Our wedding photographers didn't just provide a service; they gifted us with a treasure trove of emotions that we can revisit whenever we wish. If you're searching for more than just a photographer – if you're yearning for someone who can truly capture moments and emotions – then look no further. These are the artists who will capture your heart, your soul, and every breathtaking moment that unfolds on your special day. They are not just a photographer; they are a storyteller, a magician, and a friend.

originalText.text: Amazing photographer! Very nice and professional person. it was raining almost all day and we had just couple hours for photoset and ceremony but she did everything perfectly and we got many beautiful pictures.
